# device

**Instance Property**

The device object that created the resource.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: any MTLDevice { get }
```

## Discussion

A resource can only be used with the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] that created it.

## Related Documentation

- **Metal Shading Language Guide**
- **Metal Programming Guide**

## Identifying the resource

- **label**: A string that identifies the resource.
